ceci-text-input/description: Sends text you've entered when you press the button.
ceci-text-input/attributes/inputname/des: The name of this field, helpful when saving data.
ceci-text-input/attributes/placeholderte: The text you want your input field to show by default.
ceci-text-input/attributes/emitonchange/: Background color of the button while it is being clicked or tapped.
